cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 165 miles SE of Havana, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across west-central Cuba, then forecast to turn north-northwest toward the Florida Keys and up the west coast of Florida, before tracking along the southeast U.S. coastline

weather_observation.watch_coast: Florida Keys from east of Craig Key to Ocean Reef and Florida Bay; west coast of Florida from Englewood to Aucilla River; Cuban province of Artemisa
weather_observation.warning_coast: Cuban provinces of Cienfuegos, Matanzas, Camaguey, Ciego de Avila, Sancti Spiritus, Villa Clara, Mayabeque, Havana; Florida Keys from Craig Key to Dry Tortugas; west coast of Florida from Flamingo to Englewood
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and western Cuba, Florida Gulf coast, coastal Georgia and the Carolinas
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (probabilities <3 % for Puerto Rico and therefore not listed)
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-cycloneâ€“related winds expected at San Juan, PR
weather_observation.rainfall: Only normal trade-wind showers; no heavy rainfall directly tied to Elsa is forecast
